lines.text:
[to an old Mexican walking away from him]
Hey, you!
[disguised as an old Mexican, he turns around]
Yeah, Mexican! Do you talk it?

[to Lucky]
That's the most ignorant cuss I ever seed! He don't even talk his own language!

[being held by the Fox under gunpoint]
Los Mexicanos - my people - have a saying, Senor - every man he die sometime - what difference does it make when... or where... or how? Get it over with, Senor.
